dnr-application-type.required: Select what the application was for

dnr-full-name.required: Enter the main applicant's full name
dnr-full-name.minlength: Applicant's full name must be between 3 and 250 characters
dnr-full-name.maxlength: Applicant's full name must be between 3 and 250 characters
dnr-full-name.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer

dnr-dob.required: Enter the applicant's date of birth
dnr-dob.before: Main applicant's date of birth must be in the past
dnr-dob.after: Enter a real date of birth
dnr-dob.date: Enter a real date of birth

dnr-nationality.required: Select the main applicant's country of nationality

dnr-further-leave-to-remain.required: Select which type of further leave you applied for

dnr-visa-type.required: Select what type of visa the application was for

dnr-email.minlength: Email address must be between 6 and 256 characters
dnr-email.maxlength: Email address must be between 6 and 256 characters

dnr-telephone.minlength: Enter a telephone number, like 01632 960 001, 07700 900 982 or +44 808 157 0192
dnr-telephone.maxlength: Enter a telephone number, like 01632 960 001, 07700 900 982 or +44 808 157 0192
dnr-telephone.validInternationalPhoneNumber: Enter a telephone number, like 01632 960 001, 07700 900 982 or +44 808 157 0192
dnr-telephone.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer
